description: Constructible structures with orbital radius considerations, capacity limits, and specialized units

orbital_capacity_system.description: Some buildings have max orbital capacity. After max capacity, building more results in declining returns with performance penalties
orbital_capacity_system.note: Buildings beyond max_capacity operate at reduced efficiency

structure_tier_system.description: Exponential growth system for structure costs and outputs. Formula: tier_n_value = base_value * (growth_factor ^ tier)

energy.note: For ultra-high tier (tier 8+): 2-5% of sun output (3.8e26 W) = 7.6e24 to 1.9e25 W

factories.name: Mobile Factory
factories.description: Smallest factory unit. Portable manufacturing facility that can be relocated. Basic probe production with minimal infrastructure. Produces 0.2 probes/s at 8.0kg/probe, 50kW.

factories.name: Probe Factory
factories.description: Standard manufacturing facility for probe construction. Balanced production rate and efficiency. Produces 1.0 probes/s at 6.0kg/probe, 100kW.

factories.name: Probe Forge
factories.description: Advanced manufacturing facility with high-temperature forging capabilities. Produces probes faster with better material properties. Produces 5.0 probes/s at 5.0kg/probe, 200kW.

factories.name: Assembly Forge
factories.description: Advanced manufacturing facility with integrated assembly lines. Combines forging and assembly operations for higher throughput. Produces 20.0 probes/s at 4.0kg/probe, 350kW.

factories.name: Orbital Shipyard
factories.description: Large-scale construction facility for building probes and larger structures. Specialized assembly lines with dedicated tooling. Produces 100.0 probes/s at 3.0kg/probe, 500kW.

factories.name: Mega Shipyard
factories.description: Massive orbital construction facility with multiple parallel assembly lines. Can construct entire probe swarms simultaneously. Produces 1.0k probes/s at 2.5kg/probe, 1.5MW.

factories.name: Industrial Manufacturing Complex
factories.description: Massive industrial facility with specialized production lines for different probe types. Coordinated manufacturing operations. Produces 10.0k probes/s at 2.2kg/probe, 2.5MW.

factories.name: Orbital Assembly Complex
factories.description: Planetary-scale assembly facility coordinating multiple shipyards. Maximum production efficiency through integrated logistics. Produces 100.0k probes/s at 2.1kg/probe, 4.0MW.

factories.name: Planetary-Scale Foundry
factories.description: Enormous manufacturing complex spanning orbital space. Capable of constructing entire fleets and massive structures. Produces 500.0k probes/s at 2.0kg/probe, 12.0MW.

factories.name: System-Wide Fabrication Network
factories.description: Interconnected manufacturing network spanning the entire solar system. Ultimate production capability through distributed coordination. Produces 1.0M probes/s at 2.0kg/probe, 30.0MW.

orbital_capacity_buildings.name: Orbital Fabrication Shipyard
orbital_capacity_buildings.description: Flexible manufacturing facility that can be deployed in multiple orbits. Modular design allows rapid redeployment.

orbital_capacity_buildings.name: Orbital Data Center
orbital_capacity_buildings.description: Massive computing facility for research and coordination. Provides intelligence generation with distance-based efficiency.

orbital_capacity_buildings.name: Research Orbital Station
orbital_capacity_buildings.description: Dedicated research facility with specialized laboratories for multiple research tracks. Accelerates all research progress.

orbital_capacity_buildings.name: Quantum Relay Station
orbital_capacity_buildings.description: Communication hub using quantum entanglement for instant data transfer across the solar system. Essential for coordination.

orbital_capacity_buildings.name: Research Orbital Data Center
orbital_capacity_buildings.description: Specialized data center focused on research computation. Generates intelligence and accelerates research progress.

orbital_capacity_buildings.name: Computational Research Hub
orbital_capacity_buildings.description: Advanced computing facility with quantum processors dedicated to research simulations. Maximum research acceleration.

mining.name: Basic Mining Station
mining.description: Simple automated mining facility for extracting metal from celestial bodies. Basic production rate.

mining.name: Spaceport
mining.description: Transportation and logistics hub for material handling. Receives and distributes resources from mining operations.

mining.name: Refinery
mining.description: Basic metal processing facility. Converts raw ore into refined metal with some waste (slag).

mining.name: Industrial Refinery
mining.description: Advanced processing facility with high-efficiency extraction. Minimal waste, high throughput.

mining.name: Earth Harvester
mining.description: Large-scale planetary mining operation on Earth. Extracts vast quantities of metal from planetary crust.

mining.name: Grinder Station
mining.description: Asteroid processing facility that grinds entire asteroids into usable materials. High-volume operation.

mining.name: Nanobot Swarm Dissembler
mining.description: Cloud of nanobots that systematically disassemble celestial bodies at molecular level. Maximum extraction efficiency.

mining.name: Asteroid Conversion Facility
mining.description: Converts entire asteroids directly into construction materials. Bypasses traditional mining processes for speed.

mining.name: Gas Giant Harvester
mining.description: Extracts hydrogen and other gases from gas giant atmospheres. Provides raw materials for fusion and advanced construction.

mining.name: Ice Miner
mining.description: Specialized facility for extracting water ice and volatiles from comets and icy asteroids. Provides hydrogen and oxygen.

mining.name: Comet Processing Facility
mining.description: Specialized facility for processing comets, extracting water, volatiles, and organics. High yield for outer system operations.

mining.name: Asteroid Mass Driver
mining.description: Electromagnetic launcher that accelerates processed materials from asteroid belt to inner system. Reduces transport costs.

mining.name: Plasma Refinery
mining.description: Advanced refining facility using plasma torches for ultra-high-temperature processing. Maximum material purity and efficiency.

mining.name: Mass Energy Converter
mining.description: Advanced facility that converts slag into metal using massive amounts of energy. High energy cost but enables recovery of metal from mining waste.

mining.name: Space Elevator
mining.description: Massive tether connecting surface to orbit. Dramatically reduces transport costs and enables efficient material transfer. Can only be built on planets with solid surfaces.

mining.name: Gas Collector Scoop
mining.description: Massive atmospheric scoop for extracting gases from gas giant atmospheres. Provides hydrogen and other volatiles for fusion and advanced manufacturing.

mining.name: Electromagnetic Mass River
mining.description: Continuous electromagnetic conveyor system for moving materials between orbital zones. Reduces transfer energy costs significantly.

mining.name: Solar Accumulator
mining.description: Mercury-only facility that uses concentrated solar energy to directly vaporize and extract materials. Extremely energy-efficient mining method.

mining.name: Atmospheric Compression Mining Station
mining.description: Venus-only facility that uses atmospheric pressure and compression to extract materials from the dense atmosphere. Unique to Venus's extreme conditions.

energy.name: Basic Solar Array
energy.description: Standard photovoltaic panels for energy generation. Efficiency decreases with distance from Sun.

energy.name: Orbital SMR
energy.description: Small Modular Reactor for orbital deployment. Compact nuclear fission power plant with improved safety and efficiency.

energy.name: Orbital Fission Plane
energy.description: Large-scale nuclear fission power facility. Provides substantial constant energy output independent of solar distance.

energy.name: Orbital AP1000
energy.description: Advanced Pressurized water reactor. Generation III+ nuclear power plant optimized for orbital operation with passive safety systems.

energy.name: Orbital Fusion Reactor
energy.description: Nuclear fusion power plant. High constant energy output, requires fuel.

energy.name: Orbital MegaFusion Reactor
energy.description: Massive fusion power facility. Uses advanced magnetic confinement for enormous energy output.

energy.name: Orbital Matter-Antimatter Reactor
energy.description: Matter-antimatter annihilation reactor. Extremely high energy output through perfect matter conversion.

energy.name: ZPE Cavity Megastructure
energy.description: Massive quantum field manipulation device extracting energy from vacuum fluctuations. Harvests zero-point energy at planetary scale.

energy.name: Scalar Field Manipulator Array
energy.description: Exotic physics megastructure that extracts energy directly from fundamental scalar fields. Operates at terawatt scales.

energy.name: Black Hole Spinoza Drive
energy.description: Advanced megastructure harnessing the rotational energy of a micro black hole. Named for the philosophical implications of extracting order from chaos.

energy.name: Cosmic String Reactor
energy.description: Theoretical megastructure that extracts energy from cosmic strings - one-dimensional topological defects in spacetime. Generates petawatt-scale power.

energy.name: Casimir Harvester Array
energy.description: Planetary-scale array exploiting Casimir effect between parallel plates. Converts quantum vacuum fluctuations directly into usable energy.

transportation.name: Orbital Electromagnetic Ram Drive
transportation.description: Uses solar wind and electromagnetic fields for propulsion. Efficient inter-orbit transport system.

transportation.name: Eos Flux Drive Liner
transportation.description: Advanced transport vessel using flux drive technology. Regular service routes between orbits for efficient logistics.

transportation.name: Material Transport Network
transportation.description: Integrated network of transport systems connecting all orbital zones. Maximum logistics efficiency.

transportation.name: Quantum Entanglement Beacon
transportation.description: Uses quantum entanglement for instant synchronization of transfer trajectories. Reduces transfer time by 8% per structure.

transportation.name: Gravity Sling Launcher
transportation.description: Massive structure that uses planetary gravity assists to accelerate transfers. Reduces transfer time by 10% per structure.

transportation.name: Mass Accelerator Ring
transportation.description: Electromagnetic accelerator ring that launches probes at high velocity. Reduces transfer time by 12% per structure.

transportation.name: Warp Drive Station
transportation.description: Advanced station that generates localized spacetime curvature for faster transfers. Reduces transfer time by 15% per structure.

transportation.name: Wormhole Network
transportation.description: Stable wormhole network connecting all orbital zones. Nearly instant transfers. Bypasses normal speed reduction limits.

computing.name: Small Orbital Data Center
computing.description: Compact computing facility in orbit. Provides 500 PFLOPS (500 Petaflops) of computational power. 1 PFLOPS per kg.

computing.name: Medium Orbital Data Center
computing.description: Standard computing facility in orbit. Provides 10,000 PFLOPS (10 Exaflops) of computational power. 1 PFLOPS per kg.

computing.name: Large Orbital Data Center
computing.description: Massive computing facility in orbit. Provides 100,000 PFLOPS (100 Exaflops) of computational power. 1 PFLOPS per kg.

computing.name: Massive Orbital Data Center
computing.description: Enormous computing facility in orbit. Provides 1,000,000 PFLOPS (1 Zettaflop) of computational power. 1 PFLOPS per kg.

specialized_units.description: Different types of probes and units with specialized functions

units.name: Von Neumann Probe
units.description: Default general-purpose probe. Can harvest, construct, or build Dyson sphere. Consumes energy constantly.
